Introduction
This topic contains general information on entitlement to Old-Law or Section 306 Pension and current-law pension, including
election rights of a beneficiary entitled to Old-Law or Section 306 Pension
provisions of
Public Law (PL) 95-588
regarding non-service-connected (NSC) survivor benefits
circumstances in which the right to continued entitlement to Old-Law or Section 306 Pension is not protected
changing a beneficiaryâ€™s benefit type
, and
where to find more information on elections
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C - Elections Between Pension Programs
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section C
